title: Waitgroups: Coordinating Concurrent Goroutines
description: The waitgroups lab is designed to help you understand how to use a wait group to wait for multiple goroutines to finish.

meta.title: Coordinating Concurrent Goroutines with Waitgroups
meta.description: Learn how to use waitgroups to coordinate multiple goroutines in Go programming.
meta.keywords: go playground, concurrency, sync, waitgroups, go, golang, go labs, go playground online, go lab, goroutines
